captions.text:
Everybody plays "Questions Only".
Andy and Elidio will begin.

In this game, they can only
communicate through questions!

If there's an affirmation or an hesitation, I'll ring the
bell, the player gets out and the next one enters.

If you're reading a book,
raise your hand!

You, in the front.
What are you reading?

The 'Hunger Games' is the theme
for "Questions Only", starting now!
Are you new in this casino, boy?

- Did you never see me here before?
- What's your name?

- Don't you know Ace of Spades Tony?
- Is that really you?

Have you never...
What the hell...
Are you sure you wanna do it?

Do you know who
you're talking to?
Isn't that why we came here?

Do you know how many guns have
I used to kill a hundred people?

Do you wanna become another
dead body in this place?
Go away!

- Won't you roll the dice?
- Could you blow it for me?

- For what?
- For luck.

Honey, guess which
movie I rented?
No!

- That was a fuckin' question!
- No, it wasn't!

Elidio is always trying
to cheat, did you notice?

Honey, do you know
what movie I rented...
Yes...
What movie would that be, baby?
What was that book that you loved?

Like you don't know!
Oh, that's not a question...

Have you ever played
The Hunger Games?
How do you play it?

Have you seen the world's
biggest game board?

Don't you think it will
interfere with our studies?

Why would you want
to study math?

How could math
be useful in your life?

So I can be a better
Hunger Games player?
That was a question!

Can you show me your
ticket, please? Thanks.

Can you show me
your ticket, please?
That 'thanks wasn't a question!

- Neither was your sentence!
- He said it first, goddammit!

- Honey, you won't guess
the movie I rented... - No!

- I don't know if it counted, but it was fun!
- You were very accurate...
That was a hungry game!

CIA. BARBIXAS DE HUMOR
presented

IMPROVÁVEL
Probably a good show.

comments.author: Alvaro Raste de oliveira

comments.text:
Bruno Motta, você precisa tomar umas aulas de Português. Claro que  a 
palavra "Não" pode ser uma pergunta. Depende da entonação, seu ignorante! E 
ainda chama o ator de trapaceiro. No caso em questão, é um substituto de 
"Sério?" - uma pergunta que conota desconfiança. Qual seja, "Não?!"
Obs.: E o Porchat ainda ironizou sua ignorância e deselegância. ﻿
